import React from "react"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Login() { const location = useLocation(); const signupSuccess = location.state?.signupSuccess; return (
{/* ✅ Success message after signup */} {signupSuccess && (

✅ Account created successfully! Please log in below.

)}

Welcome Back

Don’t have an account?{" "} Sign Up

); }
